links.title: International Business News for the 25th April 2018 - Investments Revolution
links.description: Shares of Apple dropped nearly 2 percent on Tuesday as investors worries intensified about soft demand for iPhones after a warning from a company that supplies components for smartphones. South Korean chipmaker SK Hynix said following its quarterly report that it expected smartphone demand to stagnate, echoing a similar warning last week from Apple supplier Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing.

messages.body: $AAPL got some May 11 175 calls ..175 is getting further and further  away. can it come back enough? proly can
$AAPL cook has stated thy want to be cash neutral.  Minus 115 in debt, probably will have $200 billion to spend on hookers and blow
$AAPL 10 yr went to 3%..I knew to buy SPY puts, every once in a while u feel like you might know what your doing.
$AAPL Cook has said previously he is not a fan of special dividend, but okay with gradual dividend increases.  Likely big div + and buyback
